definition: calm/unruffled

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
surname Cong
surname Rong
to hold/to contain/to allow/to tolerate/appearance/look/countenance
(negative prefix)/not/no
to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing

sentences.english: Who can show the country, take it leisurely and unoppressively?
sentences.chinese: 誰又能指點江山，從容不迫？

sentences.english: Therefore, he carefully studied unhurried manner until sufficient evidence is found.
sentences.chinese: 因此他從容不迫地仔細研究，直到發現足夠證據。

sentences.english: Hindley descended more leisurely, sobered and abashed.
sentences.chinese: 辛德雷從容不迫地下來，酒醒了，也覺得羞愧了。
他保持着鎮靜並且從容不迫。

sentences.english: It is more convincing to behave calmly and unhurriedly than to air aggressively.
sentences.chinese: 從容不迫的舉止比咄咄逼人的態度更能讓人折服。

sentences.english: Now I can take my time visiting my relatives.
sentences.chinese: 現在我可以從容不迫地拜訪我的親戚。

definition: receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
magnanimous
to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly/to act according to convention
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education
lit. to have accumulated knowledge and deliver it slowly (idiom)/good preparation is the key to success/to be well prepared
elated/light and airy feeling (after a few drinks)/smug and conceited/complacent
lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
easy/with no difficulty
to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
see 磨練|磨练[mo2 lian4]
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
(idiom) impossible to fault/impeccable
